name: Hippogriff
description: A majestic creature with the front half of an eagle and the hindquarters of a horse, displaying impressive flying capabilities and powerful melee attacks.
memorable: Its ability to fly and strike with razor-sharp talons makes it a captivating opponent and a versatile mount.
goals: Typically hunts for food and fiercely defends its nest and territory.
relations: May be encountered with eagles or other aerial predators.
environment: Usually found in high mountain ranges.
strengths: Exceptional mobility with flying speed, strong physical attacks, and heightened senses.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma make it unsuitable for complex tasks and social interaction.
attacks: Can use Multiattack to strike with beak and claws, dealing piercing and slashing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Heightened Sight increases its Perception score to 18 when relying on sight.
senses: Has keen sight, giving it an advantage on sight-related Perception checks.
skills: Proficient in Perception with a total bonus of +5, granting it excellent awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Resistance to exhaustion and the frightened condition
Can dive down onto enemies for extra damage
Strong bond with skilled riders, making them popular mounts
test_queries: majestic flying creature that hunts in mountains
large creature with eagle head and horse body
predatory monster with sharp claws and beak
formidable air combatant with keen sight
